name: Dragon X for Oculus Quest
description:
Play the tutorial first which teaches controls and then head onto the main test level to test out the core concepts of the game which include battling other flying dragons and archer mills and fly through the tunnel. 

You can play in third person and first person mode, and there are lots of options in the menu (press the facebutton bottom, either X or A on Quest controller. You can play sitting (default) or you can select 360 degree rotation in the options menu and look around in real life to look in that direction in game, tutorial also explains a lot of these mechanics.

Current state is pre-alpha meaning everything is a work in progress but the game runs stably mostly at 72fps (the required framerate for Oculus Quest products).

Leave me your feedback, I appreciate it!
